item.title: Ormstorm
item.description: Welcome to ORMStorm ORMStorm is a small library for easy work with databases. The key features are: Simplicity: The library is very simple, and it won’t take long to learn it. Coding speed: Integrating the library into your projects won’t take long. Dynamic: Unlike others, this library will allow you to very quickly create new tables and add databases to them. Installing pip install ormstorm Usage Using standard tables from ormstorm import Table, Types, Column, create_session class ExampleTable(Table): __tablename__ = "example" id = Column(Types.
